query:
SELECT 
  'time_series' as table_name, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM time_series
UNION ALL
SELECT 'organizations', COUNT(*) FROM organizations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'commercial_entities', COUNT(*) FROM commercial_entities
UNION ALL
SELECT 'economic_events', COUNT(*) FROM economic_events
UNION ALL
SELECT 'research_publications', COUNT(*) FROM research_publications
UNION ALL
SELECT 'indicators', COUNT(*) FROM indicators
UNION ALL
SELECT 'glossary_terms', COUNT(*) FROM glossary_terms
